Primary Contact: Emily Veenstra, Literacy Outreach Coordinator; Phone: 250.763.0456; Email: literacy@thebridgeservices.ca
Service Details: - Broad-based collaborative community initiative that creates opportunities and activities that enhance community connections, increase literacy awareness, and increase access to sustainable supports and services in local communities- Promotes life-long learning for everyone, listening to community voices, literacy informed community development, linkages between organizations, learners, and literacy support services
